extractRDFWithLuxid

public static java.util.List<com.fluidops.util.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> extractRDFWithLuxid(java.lang.String input,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String token,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String annotationPlan,
                                                                                                            java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                            Context c,
                                                                                                            java.io.File f)
                                                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
performs LUXID text extraction to the string passed as input. Puts the parsed and extended RDF to the global repository. additionally returns a set of Key-Value-pairs which are inteded to be used as Metadata tags for Atmos

extractZip

public static java.util.Set<java.io.File> extractZip(java.lang.String fileName)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
extracts a zip-file and returns references to the unziped files. If the file passed to this method is not a zip-file, a reference to the file is returned.
